name: Wacky Warehouse
description:
Play as two characters who have been separated. Move both into the heart at the end of the level to help them to reconnect.

Characters share their various statistics like: mass, speed. and health. Giving one character more mass will make the other lighter and so on.

Controls:

[Mouse] to navigate the menu and optionally modify any statistic

[A] and [D] to move left and right

[Left Arrow] and [Right Arrow] to change which statistic is selected

[Up Arrow] and [Down Arrow] to modify the value the selected statistic

[R] to reset the level

[Spacebar] to advance some text

Created by Bararda and billbobphil - thanks for playing!
